name: UltraLinux
summary: UltraLinux is a Kubuntu-based Linux distribution.
short_description:
UltraLinux is a Kubuntu-based Linux distribution intended to be the ultimate distribution. Several versions are made towareds certain needs, such as gaming, office/education, home, and media production. And yes, it is intended to have an ultimate edition that combines all other editions and will be free, unlike the price you have to pay for Zorin Ultimate.

INCLUDED SOFTWARE*
Wine
PlayOnLinux
Firefox
Scribus
LibreOffice
Steam
Chromium
K3b

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS (Recommended in parentheses)
Intel or AMD CPU that is 64 bit capable @ 1GHz, single core. (1.5GHz, dual core recommended)
768 megabytes of RAM (1GB recommended)
30 gig hard disk (more recommended)
Internet connection for updates
Screen resolution of 1024x768 (larger is better)

Credits: All the devs of the software, Canonical, Free Software Foundation, GNU.
